scripts.template:link: yarn link @nocode-works/template && yarn link @nocode-works/store && yarn link @nocode-works/builder
scripts.template:link:plugins: yarn run template:link && yarn link @nocode-works/plugin-stripe && yarn link @nocode-works/plugin-contactform
scripts.template:softlink:plugins: yarn run template:softlink && bash ../scripts/softlink.sh plugin-stripe plugin-contactform
scripts.template:unlink: yarn unlink @nocode-works/template && yarn unlink @nocode-works/store && yarn unlink @nocode-works/builder && yarn install --force
scripts.template:unlink:plugins: yarn unlink @nocode-works/plugin-stripe && yarn unlink @nocode-works/plugin-contactform && yarn run template:unlink
scripts.template:upgrade:plugins: yarn run template:upgrade && yarn upgrade @nocode-works/plugin-stripe && yarn upgrade @nocode-works/plugin-contactform
